xtc.lang

Class CCounter

  • java.lang.Object
    • xtc.tree.Visitor
      • xtc.lang.CCounter

  • public class CCounter
extends Visitor
    A visitor to collect statistics on a C program.
    Version:
    $Revision: 1.9 $
